# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    words = split(str)
    lines = []
    for word in words
        if length(lines) == 0 || length(lines[end]) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        lines[end] *= word * " "
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```
Example:
```julia
str = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam euismod velit et turpis congue porta."
println(wrap_string(str))
```
Output:
```
Lorem ipsum dolor sit
amet, consectetur adipiscing
elit. Etiam euismod velit
et turpis congue porta.
```
